abstract: Bronx District Atty Darcel D Clark is asking New York State to impanel grand jury to hear evidence in fatal October shooting of of mentally ill woman Deborah Danner by New York City Police Officer Hugh Barry; request points to high legal and political stakes of case.

headline.print_headline: Grand Jury Sought in Killing of Ill Woman by Bronx Police
headline.main: District Attorney Asks for Grand Jury in Police Killing of Deborah Danner

snippet: Darcel D. Clark, the Bronx district attorney, requested the panel, which typically entails more extensive presentation of evidence, in the shooting of the mentally ill woman....
lead_paragraph: Darcel D. Clark, the Bronx district attorney, requested the panel, which typically entails more extensive presentation of evidence, in the shooting of the mentally ill woman.
